modName: Garrett Hawke of Dragon Age II
summary: The iconic protagonist of Dragon Age II added as a follower
descriptionHtml:
I just decided to upload a simple follower mod adding Garrett Hawke of Dragon Age II as your faithful and mighty companion in the game. He can be found just in front of the south gate of Riverwood- pretty hard to miss. He is a level 50 warrior and can be quite usefull but not difficulty-friendly for low levels (he will most certaintly steal your kills before you could land a single hit)
 EQUIPMENT:
Dragonbone Greatsword
Dragonbone Armor
                  Helmet
                  Gauntlets
                  Boots
Ebony Armor
         Boots
         Gauntlets
Iron Armor
      Gauntlets
      Boots
Gold :)
author: Kotaidakos
